summary: Implemented a shared contact constants module and updated LandingPage, ContactSection, and Footer to use the centralized phone/tel/email/address values. The diff does not provide enough evidence to confirm that all remaining old phone-number occurrences across the entire frontend (including frontend/index.html and all TSX files) were removed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Scan the entire frontend codebase and static HTML for any remaining occurrences of the old phone numbers and replace them everywhere with the correct numbers (including updating tel: links), ensuring a full-text search returns zero matches for the old numbers.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows updates in three components and the addition of a constants file, but does not show evidence of a project-wide scan/replacement (e.g., no changes shown for frontend/index.html and no evidence that other TSX files outside the three modified components were checked/updated).

hallucinated_features.description: Centralized hospital name and tagline into the shared contact constants (beyond the requested contact details: phone numbers/tel links/email/address).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-9 only requests centralizing hospital contact details (phone numbers, tel: links, email, address). Adding name/tagline to the shared constants goes beyond that scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution/link to "caffeine.ai" ("Built with ... using caffeine.ai").
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-8/REQ-9 and may constitute a user-facing footer/layout/content change beyond what is necessary to remove old phone numbers and prevent recurrence.
